title: What the fucking fuck riot
body: 2 games in a row now, im in the game walkin around and then bam, DC and "Unable to connect to the server. If you have a firewall, it may be blocking the connection. Please refer to your firewall's documentation" it was working before the patch and workded for a game earlier now nup, and im not the only person i know who has had this

replies.body: ... It's simple to fix it. Add me. It does it constantly to me too but it's easy to fix :/

Swearing won't get anyone to try and help you faster.

What ISP and OS do you use?
it happened to me a lot its bullshit i know
